text: Maarabu okhala m’chipululu amene adatsalira m’mbuyo adzati kwa iwe, “Ife tidatangwanika ndi chuma ndi mabanja athu, motero tipemphere chikhululukiro.” Iwo amangonena ndi milomo yawo zimene m’mitima mwawo mulibe. Nena, “Kodi ndani angakuyankhulireni inu kwa Mulungu ngati Iye atafuna kukuonongani kapena atafuna kuti akuchitireni zabwino? Iyayi, Mulungu amadziwa zonse zimene mumachita.”
